datagolUrl.title: Datagol API URL
datagolUrl.description: URL of the Datagol endpoint for posting job data.

datagolToken.title: Datagol API Token
datagolToken.description: Authentication token for the Datagol API.

totalJobsToFetch.title: Total Jobs to Fetch
totalJobsToFetch.description: Total number of job listings to fetch across all search combinations.

scraperTimeoutSecs.title: Scraper Timeout (seconds)
scraperTimeoutSecs.description: Maximum time in seconds to wait for each LinkedIn scraper run (max 3600).

jobTitles.title: Job Titles
jobTitles.description: List of job titles to search for. If not provided, titles will be fetched from the API.

locations.title: Locations
locations.description: List of locations to search in. If not provided, locations will be fetched from the API.

excludedCompanies.title: Excluded Companies
excludedCompanies.description: List of company names to exclude from the search results. If not provided, the list will be fetched from the API.
